::Necromancer/Hell Drak::

    Necromancer looked up, in response to Forrior asking "Did you see where
she went?".

    "I'll go after her!  She is my sister..." Necromancer said.

    With that, Necromancer hoisted himself into the ceiling.  He looked
around, and then went crawling in Hell Drak's direction, and found her.

    "Sister!  Are you alright?" Necromancer asked.

    "Ya, ya, whatever, I'm alright I'm okay I'm not dead, sheesh, you worry
too much....She went that way, that's slag the bastard...Watch out, she's
one freaky little bitch now," Hell Drak said in her vulgar mood.

     Necromancer and Hell Drak started crawling off again, in search of Iron
Raptor, Necromancer crawling behind in case of anything happening to Hell
Drak.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, July 02, 2001 2:43 AM
Subject: Re: Peek-A-Boo!


::Crater/Forrior/Blyer/Rixer/Firearm/Prowl::

Crater runs up to Necromancer, aiming his gun at the hole at the cealing bu=
t IR was already gone.

"Slag," he says, turning to Necromancer as Forrior stopped nearby, also loo=
king at the cealing, "Did you see where she went?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Rixer head jerks up as he hears Necromancer's yell, looking at Blyer. The o=
ther shruggs.

"She'll probably get away," Blyer says, "The scanners will come in useful a=
nyways."

Rixer nods, turning back to his work on the scanners.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Firearm spins around as he hears the yell, running off at full speed toward=
 where it had come from.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl silently drops down another level in the broken down ship, landing wi=
thout a sound and proceeding down a corridor. His mind, with the help of
the=
 orbs on his wings (see profile), was busy trying to detect anything in the
=
area.

He hears the Necromancer's yell, smiling a bit to himself. At least he was =
on the right track. Prowl comes up to an intersection, his senses telling
hi=
m that IR had passed through the hallway he was at. He turns, following the
=
hallway, his wing guns ready to stun just in case.

Thanks to the fact that Iron Raptor wasn't in her full SMB, Prowl could sti=
ll remain in robot mode, though how long he could resist the urge to
transfo=
rm into his monstorous second beast mode and cause carnage, he didn't know.
